delete from game_tenball_record where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(user_id) as user_count ,SUM(count_money) as count_money ,SUM(win_money) as win_money from game_tenball_record where periods = #{periods} and game_id = #{gameId} limit 1
